hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Odd Mushroom#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Shadow Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: I hear Termina is a great spot for a vacation!

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of time.
